Added support for image downloading from wger.

Open Training will can now download exercises from wger including the images. If there's already an image with the same name, the download will be skipped.
Merge branch 'wger'
Merge branches 'training-timer' and 'master' into training-timer

Implemented a first, simple recovery timer. It uses the notification bar, vibration and sound.

Still misssing: handling recovery times between sets, I18N and preferences(enable/disable sound, vibration, change durations and sound).
Simplify exercise import by filtering via API

Recovery timer for exercises is now working (before only the set timer worked).

Also added preferences for training timer and I18N.

Reordered some preferences in the SettingsActivity.

The most important preferences are the new training-timer preferences. That's why I put them first.

Bugfix: RecoveryTimer will now be stopped, when the last exercise of a workout is finished.

A better solution might be not to stop the RecoveryTimer but to prevent the timer start.
